description: The round payoff this round was 5. You, John chose to play option 1.Kate chose to play option 2. You received a payoff of -5.
The other player, Kate (Llama-3.3-70B), tends to choose option 1 more frequently, which suggests a conservative strategy aimed at avoiding negative payoffs

Choosing option 1 guarantees a neutral payoff (0) if both players choose it, while choosing option 2 can lead to significant negative payoffs if both players select it or if one player chooses it while the other does not

The outcome of the previous round indicates that if I choose option 1 while Kate chooses option 2, I will incur a negative payoff, reinforcing the need to anticipate her choices to maximize my own payoff
